Posts.Content: Nov 2, 2016 11:23PM jcn16 wrote: Your mother is fortunate to have a loving caring daughter like you! She must be a wonderful mother. Listening is probably what she needs right now. Maybe hugs too. Just being there for her so she doesn't have to go through this alone is comforting. Tell her how much you love her and how glad you are that the cancer was found and treated because she is so important to you. Ask her what you can do to help and if she doesn't know today, keep asking.
Posts.Title: How to provide emotional support? Lynn5479 georgie61
